document_data.name: Gurgon
document_data.mainbody:
'''Gurgon''' was an [[ogre]] who served the [[cult of the Absolute]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|No go inside. Inside boring.|Gurgon.}}
document_data.Description: Gurgon wore a simple loin cloth, strapped leather [[bracer]]s, and cloth wraps around his rather large feet.
document_data.Personality: He was an ogre of few words. While some could consider him terse, Gurgon could communicate just as effectively with a few words in cases where others may have chosen more.
document_data.Activities: Gurgon was tasked with protecting the main doors of the [[Shattered Sanctum]], a ruined [[Sel√ªnite]] temple that was taken over by [[the Absolute]]'s cult.
